page.title: 09Housing Winster area
page.content: Several houses have been made by converting barns, some very neat to keep the traditional exterior. One is Spigot House, an old homestead with barns on either side converted in to a whole very pleasant to look at and live in. The house at Knipe Tarn is a good example; traditional on the outside, modern and well appointed in the new shell, and done by a person who has used the old house as a holiday home for some time, and now will retire there to lovely and peaceful surroundings, and will no doubt integrate in the local community in time to come. There are known to be 23 cottages and flats to let in the village, and many more on the outskirts , in the disused farms. This is a good use for old deserted farms
